credit_line: Museum purchase from Pauline Riggs Noyes Fund
title: Design for a Gas Lamp and Candelabrum
medium: Brush and watercolor and gouache, pen and blue ink over graphite on tracing paper
description: This drawing depicts a candelabrum and gas lamp consisting of a tall-necked porcelain vase in a floral design. The vase is mounted on a gilt-bronze tri-footed base, with putti flanking a coat-of-arms surmounting a female mask. Twenty candle arms encircle the gas lamp.
name: Drawing
